promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive mythical beetle fighting-type pokemon with brown and grey wings. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or beetle. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gladiantus, a a massive mythical beetle fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Top Down. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "beetle", "fighting" or "Gladiantus". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, beetle-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, galaxy background
generatedDescription: This colossal insectoid titan, known to dwell in coliseum-like habitats, displays unmatched prowess with its Top Down skill.
